title: 2 Euro (50 years of universal female suffrage)

composition.text: Bimetallic: nickel brass clad nickel centre in copper-nickel ring

obverse.description:
The design of the coin shows a female face inside a wrapper of endless moving lines. These lines are formed by female names in Catalan language close together, making it difficult to read them individually, as a tribute to solidarity of women in the fight for their rights. There is one repeated name only, that of ‘VICTORIA’ and symbolises the victory of gaining the right to vote. 
The inscriptions ‘50 ANYS DEL SUFRAGI UNIVERSAL FEMENÍ’ (50 years of Universal Female Suffrage) and ‘ANDORRA 1970 - 2020’ complete the design. These inscriptions are also incorporated into the movement of the lines in a way, in order to give more importance to the anniversary that is being commemorated. 
The coin’s outer ring depicts the 12 stars of the European flag.
obverse.lettering:
50 ANYS DEL SUFRAGI UNIVERSAL FEMENI

reverse.description: A map, next to the face value, shows the European continent without borders.
